Materials and Methods 
Device fabrication 
High-quality regular and homogenous arrays of gold coupled dot pairs were produced by e-beam 
lithography on a clean microscopic glass substrate covered by a thin Cr (5nm) sublayer (routinely 
used to avoid charging during electron beam lithography).
